procedures.text: Possibility to work from the cabin and remotely as an operator.
The possibility of the operator working from the cabin and remotely.
Dynamic Pneumatic grain unloader with the capacity of 320 tons per hour, manufactured by Neuro, Germany, equipped with a 500kw generator with Deutz engine.
Having spare equipment for on-site maintenance.
Having dynamic high pressure wind compressor for discharging the remained oil in the line.
Equipped with Rittal panel for controlling the oil engines from the panel and loading area.
Equipped with two polyethylene pipeline routes, 8 inches in diameter, in a covered concrete canal with the length of 1100 and 1400 meters in two different docks.
Pipeline equipped with 4 halves alongside for controlling the oil current.
4800 square meters enclosed area.
With the development capability of 6000 tons.
Equipped with two geared electric pumps, 45 kw each one.
Having firefighting pipes and an 18kw electro pump in order to feed 5 hydrants in the area and also the sprinkler.
Having fully-equipped side buildings in a 200 square meters area.
4 tanks with a total capacity of 7500 tons
Having a precipitation tank with the volume of 70 tons.
The capability of loading and discharging from the tank to the ship and vice versa.
Having an overflow tank with the volume of 50 cubic meters.
Having a firefighting tank with the volume of 50 cubic meters.
10000 square meters enclosed area
Automatic capacitive bank with Rittal body
Equipped with two digital 60 tons weighbridges with German Load Cell Pfitser Waagen.
Equipped with 4 inches firefighting pipes with 5 hydrant outlets in the area
Having offices and control buildings in a 400 square meters area, with cooling and heating equipment
Galvanized grain silo manufactured by Posco Co. Italy, with total volume of 50000 tons
Equipped with 3 elevators for loading and unloading simultaneously
Control panel capable of being started up manually or automatically, equipped with PLC, Siemens 1200
Equipped with a dust collector, bottom ventilation and sweep auger (bottom sweeper)
with level laser and temperature measuring equipment with reporting capability

desc.text: Number: 2 export hives (silos) equipped with loading and unloading
